nodes.text: Jorund Redd was a Human male who lived on the desert world Tatooine during the Galactic Civil War.

Sometime after 0 BBY, he was caught in a fight between Lady Valarian's guards and Jabba the Hutt's thugs in Mos Eisley. Redd got hit on his head very hard and started feeling very sick. A medic was sent by the 2-1B droid Billingsly to help the local medical staff. When the medic examined Redd and wanted to treat his wounds, thieves sent by Valarian's aide Kavas Urdano attacked the medic. The medic managed to kill both thieves and then treated Redd's injuries.
Redd told the medic that he had friends in the Rebel Alliance and suggested that the medic may contact Droma Ordo in Anchorhead to work for the Alliance.

Jorund Redd was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. He could be found in Mos Eisley as part of the low-level quest Caught in the Crossfire, for players of the Medic profession. The player was given the mission by Billingsly, and only needed to talk to Redd in order to treat his wounds. As soon as his wounds were healed, two thief NPCs attacked the player, and a comm message from Kavas Urdano warned the player not to interfere with Valarian's business.
